text: The most effective process I've ever done or delivered for content onboarding is an audit. This can take some time if you have a lot to go through, but it helps out your new hire in the mindset of what they're walking into and where the torch needs to be carried. It also enables them to match your brand narrative, because they're fully immersed in the content. Lastly, it gets you a fresh set of eyes to see where there's gaps, what can be revised, and how they can add value with new work.
